scenes.background: Monica runs her fingers through her hair, visibly frustrated. Bob leans against the wall, arms crossed.
scenes.description: 'If we don't finish this, it will reflect poorly on all of us. Are you sure you can't stay a bit longer?'

options.text: I get how important this is. Let's push through and finish it quickly.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the collective responsibility and offered to help more, showing good empathy and perception, though your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I understand, but I need to respect my boundaries. There must be another way.
options.analysis: You stood firm on needing to respect your boundaries, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation to help.

options.text: It's frustrating that this always falls on me. We need a better system.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, potentially straining relationships with your colleagues.
